application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: REAR GARDEN		T1	Mixed Species	Shrubs growing in neighbours garden - reduce any overhang back to the boundary.T2	Weeping Willow (Salix babylonica)	Tree growing in neighbours garden - reduce to previous reduction points, removing maturest growth and retaining 1-2m and retaining younger, furnishing growth. Final Height = 5m. Final Spread = 5myounger, furnishing growth. 	T3	Plum (Prunus domestica)	Reduce crown to the most recent previous reduction points, removing approx. 0.5m of new growth - Final Height = 4m. Final Spread = 3m.	T4	Plum (Prunus domestica)	Reduce crown to the most recent previous reduction points, removing approx. 0.5m of new growth - Final Height = final Height = 4m. Final Spread = 3m.	T5	Bamboo (Chusquea quila) Reduce/thin out obvious shoots protruding from group. 	T6	Holly (Ilex aquifolium) Reduce/trim to shape, contain and tidy. 		T7	Hawthorn (Crataegus monogyna) Lightly reduce by 0.5-1m to shape and contain. Final Height = 3m. Final Spread = 7.5m	T8	Beech & Hawthorn	Trim/reduce to tidy and contain. 	T9	Himalayan Birch (Betula utilis jacquemontii) Formative prune and thin to contain and tidy. 	T10	Hornbeam and Hazel Trim/reduce to tidy and contain.
